code: @Override public void run(SourceContext<WikipediaEditEvent> ctx) throws Exception {     try (WikipediaEditEventIrcStream ircStream = new WikipediaEditEventIrcStream(host, port)) {         // Open connection and join channel         ircStream.connect().         ircStream.join(channel).         try {             while (isRunning) {                 // Query for the next edit event                 WikipediaEditEvent edit = ircStream.getEdits().poll(100, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS).                 if (edit != null) {                     ctx.collect(edit).                 }             }         } finally {             ircStream.leave(channel).         }     } }
